meanings.sent1: The nonwinning team showed great effort in the game.
meanings.sent2: She felt disappointed after the nonwinning lottery ticket was revealed.
meanings.sent3: The nonwinning squirrel tried to reach the acorn but kept slipping.
meanings.sent4: The nonwinning racehorse always gave its best despite never coming first.
meanings.sent5: The nonwinning chess player studied hard to improve their game.

meanings.definition: Of or relating to not winning.
meanings.sent1: Her nonwinning attitude affected the team's morale.
meanings.sent2: The nonwinning streak seemed never-ending for the team.
meanings.sent3: The nonwinning speech had the audience yawning within minutes.
meanings.sent4: The nonwinning strategy needed a complete overhaul to succeed.
meanings.sent5: His nonwinning record made him more determined to train harder.

meanings.definition: A person or thing that does not win.
meanings.sent1: The nonwinning of the award disappointed the young actress.
meanings.sent2: He was tired of being labeled as the nonwinning in every competition.
meanings.sent3: The nonwinning in the race still celebrated the effort put into training.
meanings.sent4: The nonwinning of the contest inspired her to try again next year.
meanings.sent5: Being the nonwinning in the talent show didn't deter her passion for singing.
